trans-unit.source: Represents the look and feel of a row in a table layout.
trans-unit.target: 표 레이아웃에 있는 행의 모양과 느낌을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The RowStyle class represents the user interface (UI) characteristics of a row in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: RowStyle 클래스 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 행의 사용자 인터페이스 (UI) 특성을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The styles for all the rows in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> are collected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 모든 행에 대 한 스타일을 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>에 수집 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: This simple class offers the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A> for a row.
trans-unit.target: 이 간단한 클래스를 제공는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A>행에 대 한.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> class to its default state.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"> </xref> 기본 상태로 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A> property to 0.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자는 설정의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A>속성을 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A>속성을 0.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> class using the supplied <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SizeType"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"> </xref> 사용 하 여 제공 된 클래스 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SizeType"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A> property to 0.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자는 설정의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A>속성을 0.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType*> indicating how the row should be should be sized relative to its containing table.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType*>행 수 방법을 나타내는 크기를 조정 하 고 있는 테이블을 기준으로 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> class using the supplied <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SizeType"></xref> and height values.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"> </xref> 사용 하 여 제공 된 클래스 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SizeType"> </xref> 및 높이 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The `height` parameter will take on different meanings depending on the `sizeType` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `height` 매개 변수에 따라 서로 다른 의미로 사용 됩니다는 `sizeType` 매개 변수입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType*> indicating how the row should be should be sized relative to its containing table.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType*>행 수 방법을 나타내는 크기를 조정 하 고 있는 테이블을 기준으로 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType*>

trans-unit.source: The preferred height in pixels or percentage of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref>, depending on `sizeType`.
trans-unit.target: 기본 설정된 높이를 픽셀이 나 백분율로 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"> </xref>에 따라 `sizeType`합니다.

trans-unit.source: height is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: height0 보다 작습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of a row.
trans-unit.target: 행의 높이 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Height property will take on different meanings depending on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Height 속성에 따라 서로 다른 의미로 사용 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the possible meanings of Height.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 가능한 의미의 높이 설명합니다.

trans-unit.source: |`SizeType` value|`Height` interpretation| |----------------------|-----------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>|The preferred row height in pixels (fractional portion ignored).| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>|Not applicable—the Height property is ignored.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>|The preferred row height as a percentage of the containing table.|
trans-unit.target: | `SizeType` 값 | `Height` 해석 | |----------------------|-----------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>| 기본 행 높이 (픽셀)입니다. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>| 해당 사항 없음-Height 속성은 무시 됩니다. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>| 기본 행 높이 포함 하는 테이블의 백분율. |</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>

trans-unit.source: The preferred height of a row in pixels or percentage of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref>, depending on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType*> property.
trans-unit.target: 기본 설정된 높이를 픽셀이 나 백분율로 행의는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"> </xref>에 따라는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType*>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType*>

trans-unit.source: The value is less than 0 when setting this property.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정할 때의 값이 0 보다 작습니다.
